metadata.title: CVE-2022-48672 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: of:fdt: fix off-by-one error in unflatten_dt_nodes() Commit 78c44d910d3e("drivers/of: Fix depth when unflattening devicetree") forgot to fix up thedepth check in the loop body in unflatten_dt_nodes() which makes itpossible to overflow the nps[] buffer... Found by Linux Verification Center(linuxtesting.org) with the SVACE static analysis tool.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
